version_description:
18 new levels have arrived! We will endlessly loop a thank you if you leave us a review!

* 2 new lovable characters with pets
* 2 new worlds to explore
* 5 new commands and 2 new events (including IF statements!)
* Help Astronaut Foo collect her lost space puppies
* Help Chef Foo cook up delicious food

18 new levels have arrived! We will endlessly loop a thank you if you leave us a review!

* 2 new lovable characters with pets
* 2 new worlds to explore
* 5 new commands and 2 new events (including IF statements!)
* Help Astronaut Foo collect her lost space puppies
* Help Chef Foo cook up delicious food

18 new levels have arrived! We will endlessly loop a thank you if you leave us a review!

* 2 new lovable characters with pets
* 2 new worlds to explore
* 5 new commands and 2 new events (including IF statements!)
* Help Astronaut Foo collect her lost space puppies
* Help Chef Foo cook up delicious food

Now play The Foos in HD! Plus...

* Faster loading and better performance across all devices
* Every Foo has a story 
     - Police Foo must find her doughnuts
     - Construction Foo has lost his tools
     - Ninja Foo must help her pet Octopus
     - And more!
* With your feedback, we revised levels 7, 8, and 16 to make learning to code even more fun!

There are too many small and fun improvements to count.  Make sure to listen to the astronaut’s new theme music!

There are too many small and fun improvements to count.  Make sure to listen to the astronaut’s new theme music!

* With your feedback, we revised levels 7, 8, and 16 to make learning to code even more fun!

There are too many small and fun improvements to count.  Make sure to listen to the astronaut’s new theme music!

Make and share games! 
- Program arcade quality games in minutes with Foo Studio
- NOTE: Foo Studio requires an internet connection
- Share games with friends and a global community of creators
- Use characters and concepts from our award-winning puzzles

Introducing Sweetopia, a mouthwatering candy-themed update for The Foos:

• 20+ new building items
• The Candy Queen - fully programmable! 
• 1 new mini-game: Sweet Sorter
• Programmable gumdrop pets
• New Shop Sections
• 20+ stickers
• New backgrounds
• New Chapter 2 puzzle level
• New Daily Coin Mail Cat
• Bug fixes and optimizations
 
If you think this update is pretty sweet, please leave us a review!

Will you be our Valentine? We’re spreading love in the form of a fun update!

· Valentine’s Day icon
· New pet and enemy animations
· Bug fixes and optimizations
 
If you accept our valentine, we’d love it if you also left us a review!

Abracadabra! We’ve pulled an update out of our hat! Introducing The Great Foodini, a mystical new update to The Foos:

*10+ new building items and stickers
*50+ new commands and parameters in the Foo Store
*New programmable pet bunny and unicorn
*Name chooser for your profile
*Name chooser for your game levels
*Puzzle progress bars
*New notifications in menu

New items and commands will magically appear in the Foo Store over the next few weeks. If you think this update is quite marvelous, please leave us a review!

Construction Foo has been hard at work upgrading Fooville. Let’s hope The Glitch doesn’t cause any trouble in this update:

- Full movie controls for in-game movie player
- Fix for not having inventory on brick staircase tutorial level
- More animations on pets and commands
- Bug fixes and optimizations

Reviews keep The Glitch out of trouble, so if you’ve enjoyed The Foos, please leave us a review!

- Big improvements for how user created games are highlighted in the community
- Bug fixes and optimizations

Welcome to codeSpark Academy! The Foos are so excited to show you what’s new in Fooville:

- Subscription purchase
- New puzzles and content added monthly 
- Game kits for a “paint-by-numbers” game making experience
- Daily activities that adapt to your child’s coding ability
- New menus and navigation

If your kids are enjoying Fooville’s remodel, please leave us a review.

We’ve been hard at work fixing some of the most common issues from the update:

- Log in on multiple devices automatically through iCloud
- Registration email no longer needs to be unique
- Keyboard no longer capitalizes the first letter of username for easier logins
- Bug fixes and optimizations

If you encounter any problems, email support@codespark.org.

Welcome to Booville! We’re getting into the spirit of Halloween with our new “Foos and Boos” update:

- New Halloween-themed items and characters for some spooky fun levels
- New Game Kits to inspire young creators
- New subscription options available
- Bug fixes and optimizations

If you find anything tricky with this update, email support@codespark.org. If you think this update is a treat, please leave us a review.

What’s The Glitch done now? Fooville’s favorite resident is causing chaos again in some brand new puzzle levels! New puzzles and items will be available in the app in the coming weeks. 

- 17 new puzzles featuring Police and Construction Foo (and The Glitch)
- 12 new Foo pets
- 2 new game kits
- Improved the “Restore Purchases” sign in
- New star and gem collecting system in the puzzle levels
- Updates to the Teacher Dashboard
- New “expert mode” for Daily Activities
- Bug fixes and optimizations

If you encounter any problems, email support@codespark.org. If you’re enjoying the new updates, please leave us a review.

Fooville got some new updates!

- 12 new Foo Pets
- 2 new Game Kits
- Register for a parent or teacher account using your email address - no need for a separate username anymore
- Bug fixes and optimizations

If you encounter any problems, email support@codespark.org. If you’re enjoying the new updates, please leave us a review.

Yippee! Fooville’s getting an update! Stack Fooville’s beloved pets in gravity defying combinations in the brand new mini-game Wild West Pets!

* New mini-game teaching Stacks and Queues - two fundamental data structures in computer science
* 2 new pets and a new Foo to use in the Game Maker
* Updates to the Daily Activities
* Registration improvements
* Bug fixes and optimizations

The pets and Foo will be available in the app over the next few weeks. If you encounter any problems, email support@codespark.org. If you’re enjoying the new updates, please leave us a review.

Spring is in Fooville
Cherry blossoms have appeared
New updates are here:

- New Foo Studio shop items: White Ninja, cherry blossom background and stickers
- Nine brand new levels starring Naomi the Ninja Foo
- Foo stickers for iMessage
- Added FAQ link in the Parent Portal
- Bug Fixes and optimizations

The new levels will be available in the app over the new few weeks. If you encounter any problems, please email support@codespark.org. If you’re enjoying the new updates, please leave us a review.

Welcome to Loony Lair, home of the science (and candy) loving Professor Loony Bubbles! She’s invented some cool new items for you to build into your games:

- 8 new stickers and programmable items to use in the Game Creator
- New playable character Professor Loony Bubbles
- New laboratory background

If you encounter any problems, please email support@codespark.org. If you’re enjoying the new updates, please leave us a review.

Fooville just got a whole lot fluffier! Introducing Pet Pals, a new feature in codeSpark Academy where you run your very own Pet Center! 

- Feed, clean up after, and play with cuddly (and not so cuddly) pets
- Using automation, kid coders will program Foo Helpers to help with the upkeep of their pet center
- Each pet will have their own specific needs, and it’s up to you to use your problem solving skills as more and more pets visit the Pet Center

If you encounter any problems, please email support@codespark.org. If you’re enjoying the new updates, please leave us a review.

Introducing Snoopy Snow Brawl from codeSpark Academy! Learn the basics of coding this holiday season by coding Snoopy’s Beagle Scouts in a multiplayer snowball game! This Hour of Code(TM) experience covers the key programming concepts of sequencing, parameters, and loops, while enabling multi-player fun for the first time in the app! Practice your coding skills and challenge your friends. Last scout standing wins! Play while it lasts! This experience is only available until January 15, 2018.

Practice your coding skills and challenge your friends. Last scout standing wins! Play while it lasts! This experience is only available until January 15, 2018.

Do a little dance, make an awesome game - let’s code tonight! 
Daily coins are back!
Remixed levels now pay homage to their original designers by including their profile names (not real names, of course!)
We’ve made updates to our Game Maker - including Monkey Dances!
We have a brand new icon for the Wait command
Our Sweet Sorter icons are bigger, making patterns easier to see for children with color vision deficiencies
Bug fixes and optimizations

If you encounter any problems, please email support@codespark.org. If you’re enjoying the new updates, please leave us a review.

Holy gleeful glowering glitches! Fooville is under attack by a vile villain and only the SuperFoos can save the day. They’ll use their superpowers to defeat these supervillains - and teach variables to our kid-coders!

This update is jam-packed with fantastic fiends, helpful heroes, and a variety of variables to keep kids entertained while teaching them a new computer science concept. 

- SuperFoos are here including four new characters, new backgrounds, stickers, and props for our Game Maker
- There are three new “superpower” commands, each with a set of variables
- The ability to add new events in Game Maker is here
- Our Game Maker has a “Command Demo” mode (really helpful for new coders!)
- Some of our Game Maker backgrounds now have custom music
- New options for China-based players makes registration simpler
- Bug fixes and optimizations

If you encounter any problems, please email support@codespark.org. If you’re enjoying the new updates, please leave us a super review!

Holy gleeful glowering glitches! Fooville is under attack by a vile villain and only the SuperFoos can save the day. They’ll use their superpowers to defeat these supervillains - and teach variables to our kid-coders!

This update is jam-packed with fantastic fiends, helpful heroes, and a variety of variables to keep kids entertained while teaching them a new computer science concept. 

- SuperFoos are here including four new characters, new backgrounds, stickers, and props for our Game Maker
- There are three new “superpower” commands, each with a set of variables
- The ability to add new events in Game Maker is here
- Our Game Maker has a “Command Demo” mode (really helpful for new coders!)
- Some of our Game Maker backgrounds now have custom music
- New options for China-based players makes registration simpler
- Bug fixes and optimizations

If you encounter any problems, please email support@codespark.org. If you’re enjoying the new updates, please leave us a super review!

Happy Lunar New Year! The Foos are celebrating the Year of the Dog with some new friends, including the fabled Monkey King and three fantastic pets!

-Limited Edition Lunar New Year items are in the Shop. Buy them while you can - they’re only available for a short time!
-Play as the Monkey King in Game Maker with a new command: Tornado!
-Unlock three new Lunar New Year pets in Pet Pals
-Enjoy a smoother gameplay experience with our latest round of bug fixes and optimizations

If you encounter any problems, please email support@codespark.org. If you’re enjoying the new updates, please leave us a super review!

This update is about sharing and finding cool creations.  Played a game that’s pretty? Or found a game full of traps? Now you can let others know - with emojis!

In the community section you can now categorize, search for, and rate games using 40 different emojis. You can also give emoji feedback for games you play!

Plus, now you can now share your games with friends and family who don’t have codeSpark Academy installed.  Grandma can play your games! 

This update also includes our latest round of fixes and optimizations for better gameplay.

If you encounter any problems, please email support@codespark.com. If you’re enjoying the new updates, please leave us a review.

Created a really cool game? Want to share it with another friend playing codeSpark Academy? Now you can with just a click of a button!

We’ve updated our community experience so that after you played or published a game you can send your friend a link to that game. No need to type in a game code anymore. Plus, we’ll also recommend fun games to play, remix, and inspire your own game design and coding. 

This update also includes our latest round of fixes and optimizations for better gameplay.

If you encounter any problems, please email support@codespark.com. If you’re enjoying the new updates, please leave us a review.

- Bug Fixes and optimizations

If you encounter any problems, please email support@codespark.org. If you’re enjoying the new updates, please leave us a review.

Join our two new Foo friends, Sergio and Sophie, on a brand new minigame adventure: Crocodile Catch! Explore mysterious ancient temples - and the concepts of variables and inequalities - but keep an eye out for crafty crocs! Crocodile Catch has 32 levels of discovery, fun, and learning for all of our subscribers. 

There’s also….
- New game maker items from Crocodile Catch available in the Shop
- A new variable modify command and a variable conditional in Game Maker
- The ability to loop the gem variable in Game Maker
- A brand new reward screen
- Smoother gameplay experience with our latest round of bug fixes and optimizations

If you encounter any problems, please email support@codespark.org. If you’re enjoying the new updates, please leave us a review!

Fooville's got a new look! We've made some updates on our menus:

- Puzzle islands now show how many stars you've completed
- Find Game Maker under "Create"
- Find Minigames under "Explore"

If you're experiencing any trouble, please email support@codespark.com. If you're enjoying codeSpark Academy, please leave us a review. Reviews help us continue to make coding accessible for schools and improve the app.

Your little coders can now create their own sensational stories with codeSpark Academy! 
Using our word-free coding interface, game makers become storytellers as kid-coders program the lovable Foos to walk, eat, and play through interactive scenes:
* Add characters, backgrounds, and props to code your own stories
* Personalize your story with recorded voice clips and text input
* Stories are saved to the device, not the account

If you're experiencing any trouble, please email support@codespark.com. If you're enjoying codeSpark Academy, please leave us a review. Reviews help us continue to make coding accessible for schools and improve the app.

Halloween has come to Fooville and you can find all the tricks and treats - including new Witches and Ghosts! - in the Store for a limited time. Snag your ghoulish goodies before they disappear on November 15th!

Don’t forget Story Maker, our latest feature inside codeSpark Academy. It’s perfect for telling spooky stories and tall tales this Halloween season!

This update also includes our latest round of fixes and optimizations for better gameplay - so let’s get coding!

Writer’s block? Trying to come up with a great Story but just can’t get the ball rolling? Now, you can use Story Ideas, our latest mini-tutorials, to spark your imagination while learning new coding tricks! With Story Ideas, you’ll learn how to make characters walk and talk, record your voice, take pictures, and so much more!

This update also includes our latest round of fixes and optimizations for better gameplay - so let’s get coding!

If you encounter any problems, please email support@codespark.com. If you’re enjoying the new updates, please leave us a review.

Collect ‘em all: badges have arrived at codeSpark Academy!

Badges are awarded for completing activities, uncovering secrets, and trying new things! Some badges even unlock rewards like coins, shop items, and even avatar profile images. That’s right! One of our most requested features is now available: kid-coders can change their profile avatars!

This update also includes our latest round of fixes and optimizations for better gameplay - so let’s get coding!

If you encounter any problems, please email support@codespark.com. If you’re enjoying the new updates, please leave us a review.

Puzzled about puzzles? Not to worry - we’ve made some Foo-tastic updates!
We’ve optimized the puzzle play experience to help keep kid-coders from getting stuck, to let them more easily see and understand the layout of puzzles, and to encourage them to earn all three stars per puzzle, ensuring that they learn each skill thoroughly before moving onto the next!
Our budding builders will also have a smoother gameplay experience with our latest round of bug fixes and optimizations.

If you encounter any problems, please email support@codespark.com. If you’re enjoying the new updates, please leave us a review.

Coded an awesome story? Want to share with your family? Your friends? With the codeSpark community? Now you can with Story Sharing!

Our latest update allows you to safely share your stories in the codeSpark community. Share your stories, read stories from other players and give emoji feedback! Plus, you can now access your stories on any device!

You’ll need parent permission and a subscription to share your stories. All stories will be pre-moderated before being shared in the community, and are saved on our secure servers.

This update also includes our latest round of fixes and optimizations for better gameplay, as well as new badges to earn from sharing stories.

If you encounter any problems, please email support@codespark.com. If you’re enjoying the new updates, please leave us a review.
